short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension has no official connection or permission to use Paul Blart and this is purely a fan tribute to Paul Blart.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This fun extension replaces images found on ArtStation.com, Foundation, and SuperRare with images of Paul Blart, bringing you the novelty and joy of Paul Blartstation when you're exhausted of the current gallery offering that ArtStation.com has to offer.

Simply install this extension and then click the Paul Blart extension icon to toggle whether or not the extension is active.

This extension only affects ArtStation.com, collects no data, and can easily be disabled or removed with no side effects.
